org.xchain.framework.quartz

Class CommandJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.framework.quartz.ThreadLifecycleJob
      • org.xchain.framework.quartz.CommandJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.quartz.Job
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StatefulCommandJob

    public class CommandJob
extends ThreadLifecycleJob

    A Quartz job that executes an XChain command. This job takes takes the following entries in the <job-data-map>:

    Key Type Description
    catalog-system-id URL The URL of the catalog that contains the command.
    command-name QName The QName of the command to execute. See the QName.valueOf(String) method for the format of this field.

    Example Configuration:

      <job-detail>
    <name>JOB_NAME</name>
    <group>JOB_GROUP</group>
    <description>JOB_DESCRIPTION</description>
    <job-class>org.xchain.framework.quartz.CommandJob</job-class>
    <job-data-map allows-transient-data="false">
      <entry>
        <key>catalog-system-id</key>
        <value>URL</value>
      </entry>
      <entry>
        <key>command-name</key>
        <value>{NAMESPACE_URI}LOCAL_NAME</value>
      </entry>
    </job-data-map>
  </job-detail>
    Author:
    Christian Trimble
    See Also:
    QName.valueOf(String)
